reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and informative. She always makes time for student questions.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Prof. Chen's projects are challenging but incredibly rewarding.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Williams knows her subject well, but her assignments can be unclear at times.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez brings history to life with his storytelling approach. Very enjoyable classes.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's lab sessions are extremely well-organized. She explains complex concepts clearly.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson rushes through material too quickly. It's hard to keep up in his classes.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's passion for literature is contagious. Her feedback on essays is always constructive.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor's lectures can be dry, but his office hours are very helpful.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Lee facilitates great class discussions. Her course has really opened my eyes to social issues.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson uses real-world examples to illustrate economic principles. Very practical approach.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Parker's enthusiasm for art is infectious. Her virtual museum tours are a highlight.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Kim's lectures are informative but can be biased at times. Encourages debate though.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez organizes great field trips. Her hands-on approach to learning is effective.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. White's classes are mind-bending in the best way. He really makes you think critically.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Davis simplifies complex neurological concepts well. Her pop quizzes keep you on your toes.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Prof. Lee's course content feels outdated. Needs to incorporate more digital marketing strategies.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Wong's interactive language exercises are fun and effective. Best language class I've taken.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Foster knows his stuff, but can be intimidating to approach for help.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Clark's research stories from the field make anthropology come alive. Assignments are tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Green's passion for music is inspiring. His composition workshops are incredibly helpful.
